channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I begged my adviser to sell amid the market turmoil. He dragged his feet and I lost $20,000. Do I have any recourse?
item.description: “If he had moved my money out of the market weeks ago, much of my loss could have been prevented.”

item.title: Stocks that benefit from chaos are helping a husband-and-wife investing duo beat the competition
item.description: The Marshfield Concentrated Opportunity Fund is up in 2025 and beating the S&P 500 on a three and five year basis. Two of the portfolios managers dish...

item.title: I held power of attorney for my late brother. Can I withdraw money from his bank account to give to his favorite charity?
item.description: ‘He honestly believed the power of attorney was also the beneficiary of this account, so a beneficiary was not listed’

item.title: Bond market is the Achilles’ heel of Trump’s ‘big, beautiful’ budget bill, say investors
item.description: President Donald Trump’s budget plan come reignite tumult in the U.S. bond market

item.title: How Trump’s tariffs could leave the Fed at risk of triggering stagflation
item.description: Appeasing Trump would require the Fed to abandon its 2% inflation target. Pressure is mounting for that.

item.title: Tuesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Tech shares lifted the S&P 500 to back-to-back gains on Monday, and the Dow Industrials added more than 300 points. Here's what CNBC is watching Tuesd...

item.title: Nvidia can survive tariff uncertainty and is a top pick, says Redburn Atlantic
item.description: Nvidia may be able to weather a semiconductor slowdown induced by tariff uncertainty, according to Redburn Atlantic.

item.title: The uptrend in one of last year's best performing groups is in trouble, according to Katie Stockton
item.description: Support from the cloud model has been broken.

item.title: Barclays downgrades this U.S. automaker because of tariffs, sees more than 10% downside
item.description: The bank downgraded the Detroit automaker to equal weight from overweight and slashed its price target on the name by $30 to $40.

item.title: Verve Therapeutics: A New Era in Cardiovascular Disease Treatment?
item.description: In a major breakthrough, Verve Therapeutics (VERV) has announced positive results from its Heart-2 clinical trial. This news sent shockwaves through t...

item.title: Banco Macro’s 10.3% Surge: Is This Argentine Bank a Hidden Gem?
item.description: The markets are always full of surprises, and today is no exception. Banco Macro (NYSE:BMA), an Argentine bank with operations in the region, has seen...

item.title: Buy this energy stock amid the Trump tariff turmoil, investor Victoria Greene says
item.description: Investors should consider taking up shares of this energy stock, according to G Squared Private Wealth's Victoria Greene.

item.title: MP Materials: Riding the Wave of Rare Earth Metals Demand
item.description: As tensions between the US and China continue to escalate, one stock has caught our attention – MP Materials (MP). The company’s shares have surged ov...

item.title: The AI Revolution in Biotech: Recursion Pharmaceuticals Soars 19.18% on FDA’s New Approach to Animal Testing

item.title: Gold Rush: Newmont Corporation Soars on Record Gold Prices and Tariff Uncertainty
item.description: The gold market is shining bright, with prices hitting record highs as investors flock to safe-haven assets amidst economic uncertainty. And one stock...
